narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Yesenia Flores-pinos is a Psychologist provider based in Teaneck, NJ. From 2018-01 through 2019-05, this provider received $183K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 751 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 90834 (90834), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-05, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
